summary: The "Keep Our Girls Safe Act of 2025" (H.R. 2452) aims to clarify Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972 regarding locker room access in educational settings. The bill mandates that locker rooms actively used in connection with education programs or activities can only be used by individuals of the same sex, determined solely by reproductive biology and genetics at birth. The act, introduced in the House of Representatives on March 27, 2025, would become effective 30 days after its enactment.
